thread.title: St Etienne v Man Utd: Reaction to Zlatan Ibrahimovic playing is hilarious | Metro News
thread.title_full: St Etienne v Man Utd: Reaction to Zlatan Ibrahimovic playing is hilarious | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: St Etienne v Man Utd: Reaction to Zlatan Ibrahimovic playing is hilarious | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 9:51 am Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored a hat-trick when the sides met last Thursday (Getty) Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic loves playing against St Etienne, with the Swede having scored more goals against the French outfit than any other side. 
When the Red Devils hosted them in the first-leg of their Europa League Round of 32 tie last week he scored a hat-trick and took his tally against them to 17 goals. Gareth Bale Exclusive: Wales not doing a Leicester, THAT England loss & being a film star 
So it’s quite understandable that St Etienne would rather Ibrahimovic wasn’t involved in tonight’s second leg. However, they’re not supposed to publicly admit that. 
But their winger Romain Hamouma couldn’t help but be honest upon learning Jose Mourinho plans to play a strong side, despite holding a 3-0 advantage, and that Ibrahimovic will likely be involved. 
‘Ibrahimovic isn’t playing, right? He is? Shit!’ said Hamouma in the build-up to the game. Romain Hamouma is not looking forward to facing Ibrahimovic tonight (Getty) 
‘I mean, what can you say? How many goals has he scored against us? 17, right? 
‘What do you want me to say!?’ Manchester United fixtures 
St-Etienne – Europa (A) – Wed 22 Feb Southampton – EFL (N) – Sun 26 Feb Bournemouth (H) – Sat 4 Mar Southampton (A) – Sun 12 Mar Middlesbrough (A) – Sun 19 Mar West Brom (H) – Sat 1 Apr Everton (H) – Tue 4 Apr Sunderland (A) – Sat 8 Apr
